attributes.action: Online Shopping sites must provide full description of country of manufacture.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe this is the right and patriotic stance to follow given the ruinous nature from Covid 19 upon our economy.
It is in the countries national interest to encourage more made and bought in the United Kingdom where possible to avoid long-term recession and unemployment.
attributes.background:
I want government to create more manufacturing within Great Britain, to help create employment, strengthen our economy, and help raise funding to the Exchequer thus helping to keep Taxes lower.
All that can be achieved with the populace help, if they choose at point of sale where goods were made.
